reviews.text: Walked in feeling welcomed and was seated immediately. Ordered chilaquiles verdes with al pastor and beans, and a lime margarita. I usually judge a place by their chilaquiles, and Rancho Tulcingo is fantastic by that standard, pretty cheap as well ($11 + $3 for adding meat), and it came out within 10 minutes of ordering. The margarita was good, although a bit more expensive than I'm used to. I'll certainly be back to try some other things on their large menu, give it a shot!
Wonderful local spot, they never disappoint. Huaraches and chimichangas were delicious!
Amazing food, great service I ordered the burrito bowl best bowl I ever had

I feel bad that I got upset because I ordered something that specified three flautas served with rice and beans. They seem very nice but I was just disappointed that I paid almost 30 dollars since I ordered avocados on the side on uber eats and never received rice and beans. On the order it mentioned three flautas served with rice and beans, i believe they need to remove that because it doesn‚Äôt specify clearly that it‚Äôs 4 instead of 3. It states three like it comes with three flautas and rice and beans.

This restaurant is like being at the corner diner in Mexico City, the flavor of the food is exactly like the ‚ÄúReal Mexican‚Äù Chilango seasoning! The atmosphere, the music, the decor, the service, make me feel like I am definitely in Mexico, very nice place, the service of the waiter Kevin is excellent, very attentive, friendly and helpful, I recommend the Red Pozole, the Birria Consome, the waters here are really ‚Äúnatural‚Äù‚Ä¶ from Jamaica, Horchata, Tamarindo, it is truly a place you cannot miss if you are in Bronx, NY‚Ä¶ 100% Recommended!!! Delicious delicious delicious. All of the meats are seasoned to perfection. Every bite is delicious. wow wow wow. The service is really great too! You can feel that the food here is made with love üòå‚Ä¶

Today, Rancho Tulcingo disrespected me. I ordered a Torta de Milanesa de pollo. And as you can see by the pictures, there was no Milanesa de Pollo. I don't even know what that is! Just the Milanesa (breading)? How dare they have the gall to sell this! I PAID $13 FOR THIS? I know ya can agree with me just how disrespectful this is to their customers. And to a loyal customer! As of today, I stop endorsing this place. Go to MEXICAN DELI GROCERY around the corner, instead. They would never! And they never have!!
This restaurant is a gem! The people are so nice and friendly, the food is so tasty. And the music is always well selected. Definitely save this spot to come back again and again. It never gets old.

If I could give more then 5üåü I would. This is top rate Mexican food and the people who work here are so lovely! Great for international visitors and locals. The lime margarita is fantastic and a must try! We also tried the burrito and stake quesadilla , both fantastic.

Wish I could give higher than 5 stars! Delicious food and drinks and very welcoming! We wish we could try all the menu but everything we did try was fantastic. Highly recommended, especially with a short walk to the botanical garden!
